trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Net.WebClient.DownloadProgressChanged" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Net.WebClient" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebClient" /> 的 <see cref="E:System.Net.WebClient.DownloadProgressChanged" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are passed to the <xref:System.Net.DownloadProgressChangedEventHandler>.
The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.DownloadProgressChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置的事件处理程序<xref:System.Net.WebClient.DownloadProgressChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an implementation of a handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示此事件的处理程序的实现。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes received.
An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that indicates the number of bytes received.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示收到的字节数的 <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: To determine what percentage of the transfer has occurred, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定发生的传输占多少百分比，使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an implementation of a handler for the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.DownloadProgressChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现的处理程序<xref:System.Net.WebClient.DownloadProgressChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The method displays the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 该方法显示此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bytes in a <see cref="T:System.Net.WebClient" /> data download operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebClient" /> 数据下载操作中的字节总数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that indicates the number of bytes that will be received.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示将要接收的字节数的 <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of bytes already received, use the <xref:System.Net.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定已接收的字节数，请使用<xref:System.Net.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To determine what percentage of the transfer has occurred, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定发生的传输占多少百分比，使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an implementation of a handler for the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.DownloadProgressChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现的处理程序<xref:System.Net.WebClient.DownloadProgressChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The method displays the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 该方法显示此属性的值。
